reviewText: My dvd came extremely fast, and was in perfect shape.  Billy is so funny and tells it like it is.  Let's hear it for Pittsburgh, too!
Title: Billy Gardell: Halftime

reviewText: Billy Gardell's comedic style is fantastic and relatable.  His stories are true to life and you can say "Oh, my goodness, I have people like that in my family!"
Title: Billy Gardell: Halftime

reviewText: I love this one of Billy. He takes me back to my childhood. If you want to laugh....buy it. You can't go wrong.
summary: best video yet for laughs too funny
Title: Billy Gardell: Halftime

reviewText: Funny!  He's hilarious!  His jokes hit close to home and made me laugh my tush off.  I highly recommend this DVD, and I hope he does another show soon.
Title: Billy Gardell: Halftime

reviewText: This is an absolutely hilarious DVD. I would love it if there were more standup performances to purchase of Billy since he's terrific at it, but this seems to be the only DVD available. I also adore his performances on the TV comedy,Mike & Molly.
Title: Billy Gardell: Halftime

reviewText: I love Billy Gardell! My man and I quote him a lot and my mom loves it too. He is almost as funny as Fluffy.
Title: Billy Gardell: Halftime

reviewText: I start to laugh as soon as I see him (and I mean that in a good way!)  He talks about things that everyone can relate to, and makes life and its issues easy to deal with, since he makes you laugh at them.  I started the DVD, and felt like I was having a beer with a lifelong friend and talking about the day.  The next thing I knew, the show was over and I was totally energized.  He is magic!
Title: Billy Gardell: Halftime

reviewText: 'Billy Gardell' Halftime is one of those rare stand up routines that maintains a certain level of hilarity throughout. Where many comedians seem to have high peaks  combined with long drawn out bits used as filler in the middle of their acts, Gardell remains consistent and keeps this excellent set running on all cylinders. Another plus is that the comedian doesn't use profanity excessively, but don't think this is a family affair, the jokes are aimed at adults.
summary: CONSISTENTLY FUNNY FROM BEGINNING TO END!
Title: Billy Gardell: Halftime

reviewText: A good quality comedian. Very funny jokes and perspectives on things. You won't be disappointing if you watch this gem.
Title: Billy Gardell: Halftime

reviewText: I saw this special on Comedy Central and had to get the DVD to see what didn't make the cut. There's about 20+ minutes more than there was on the TV show. Absolutely roaringly funny -- my husband and I laughed until we cried.
Title: Billy Gardell: Halftime

reviewText: If you've seen him on "Mike and Molly" you know what perfect comedic timing Billy Gardell has!  His story about the dog protecting the little boy made me laugh so hard I cried!  This DVD finds Billy in front of his hometown crowd!  Very funny addition to your DVD collection and makes an awesome gift!
Title: Billy Gardell: Halftime

reviewText: This is one of the funniest comedy albums I own.  I urge you to purchase it. If you like him on Molly and Me, you'll live this.
Title: Billy Gardell: Halftime

reviewText: I was fortunate to be able to catch the taping of Billy Gardell's new special "THalftime" in Pittsburgh. I have been a Billy Gardell fan for a while (who from Pittsburgh isn't?) catching him at teh local comedy club and recently watching him every Monday night on Mike & Molly. Even though I was actually at the taping, I can't wait to receive the DVD in the mail so I can catch all the great special features! I also love the Pittsburgh love he shows throughout this special and his entire career.BLACK & YELLOW!!!
summary: Hilarious Special from a Hilarious Comedian!
Title: Billy Gardell: Halftime

reviewText: My spouse has been enjoying some of the stand-up comedy that I've treated her to lately (see for example:Gabriel Iglesias: Hot and Fluffy - Live From BakersfieldandGabriel Iglesias: I'm Not Fat...  I'm Fluffy) and since I had some Amazon Instant Video credits thanks to bonuses included with some Blu-ray purchases I had recently made, I bought this one to add to my library.  Let me say, I wasn't disappointed.I've seen Billy Gardell's routine before, probably on Comedy Central from this very same recording.  He was quite funny.  I enjoy catching him on his current TV series:Mike & Molly: The Complete First Seasonwhen my daughter is watching that on the TV (I never seem to have the time to sit and catch it regularly :-  so it wasn't much of a stretch to give this 'concert' a shot.  I have to say, I'm glad I did as it was pretty funny and kept me and my Mrs. well entertained as we watched it.  Not quite as consistently gut-bustin' funny as the Fluffy one, but still very good and worth the purchase and addition to my video library.If you are looking for some laughs, you could certainly spend the 1 hour and 10 minutes (give or take) that this show runs for doing much worse...
Title: Billy Gardell: Halftime
